website_summaries.verdict: Long-lasting, gentle, no residue and keeps you dry. Reviewers say this deodorant is hard to find for a reason.
pros: Reviewers say this deodorant truly does last a full 24 hours

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the Clinique price!
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe all these other reviewers are so loyal to this WAY over-priced product, and I'm a fan of Clinique. The container is up to Clinique standards, and the product itself works as well as its $3 competitors. So what's my complaint? The ball that applies the product sticks and drags on your sensitive underarm skin when you first start applying it, and it hurts. I'm going back to the $3 grocery store brands!
customer_reviews.author: Kokopelli

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I started to use this deodorant a long time ago. My dermatologist told I was allergic to deodorant with any type of fragrance. He recommended this deodorant. I love it , does the work and is stain free. It was less expensive when I started to used but is worth it !
customer_reviews.author: Adja

customer_reviews.title: Smells Bad
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 2 because it was delivered quickly; otherwise it's a 1. Clinique usually has a great reputation so I assumed it would smell good. Just out of the box, the deodorant actually smelled like sweat. Others confirmed the same. Too bad because it wasn't cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling to find an antiperspirant/deodorant that actually did the job, was fragrance free and didn't give me some crazy rash, and this is it!! I'm still getting used to the rollerball/ gel deal because I'm used to Dove sticks but overall im a fan. clinique always pulls through which is why the price doesn't bother me, i would rather pay extra then suffer the consequences of a poor product that my skin hates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great AntiPerspirant
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very subtle which is great & it works!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy G Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this deodorant. It dries quickly, and keeps you dry. It's odorless and just a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Wise

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, scentless but costly.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for years. It has no scent which is partly why I buy it and it does the job but it is costly. I realise I am paying for the name as well as the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sue H

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Clinique deodorant for over 35 years. No need to change
customer_reviews.author: Katia

customer_reviews.title: awesome deodorant who knew ???
customer_reviews.text: OMG , best stuff ever. expensive but worth it. love it and its great for travel too
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jo

customer_reviews.title: Only one I like. No powdery stuff
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for 15+ years. Only one I like. No powdery stuff, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: Buy only if you want to stink like BO
customer_reviews.text: Ineffective deodorant. Don’t waste your money. It isn’t even worth 2 dollars let alone what it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Ziehm

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic Antiperspirant have ever used..
customer_reviews.text: It’s powdery.. leaves white marks on dark clothes. Doesn’t really serve the purpose. It isn’t smooth or blend with the skin. You just feel it all the time. Overtime it gets itchy. Very annoyed just used twice and done with it. Didn’t expect this with Clinique.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I have couples of weeks using it, no complaints at all 24 hrs full protection.
customer_reviews.author: Marlenip

customer_reviews.title: Cost to much
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, it cost to much for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: franco

customer_reviews.title: This is the product I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: It has no strong scent found in other products and has a natural scent. The liquid may turn yellow if it gets on your underwear and should be wiped or dried after it has been applied to your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sang-yeol LEE

customer_reviews.title: I nearly paniced when I couldn't find this Macy's or ...
customer_reviews.text: I nearly paniced when I couldn't find this Macy's or Sefora. This has been my go to for decades.
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for sending the product so quickly. It is perfect. I am glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Denver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: product to which I'm not allergic - not easy to find
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rose

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and didn't work. The roll ball doesn't apply any deodorant..
customer_reviews.author: LA TV Dude

customer_reviews.title: Same great product!
customer_reviews.text: Same Clinique name brand antiperspirant. It's just 1/2 oz. more in volume than the original bottle. Effective product, no fragrance, does not leave white mark on clothing. I have fragrance sensitivities, so that factor is critical. I've been using this for years. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Best one so far
customer_reviews.text: Best deodorant ever, I’m a gym rat and was looking for a deodorant that doesn’t have a strong scent. This doesn’t not only does that, but also last a long time. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Braulio Gomez

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: cliniques deodorant is the best/ can use directly after shaving with no irritation ever and it works
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband actually loves this product. Keeps him dry and last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: taz

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would be better since it's a good brand but I thought it ...
customer_reviews.text: It was just ok. I thought it would be better since it's a good brand but I thought it left a strange odor and also looked a little white.
customer_reviews.author: MsDevine

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this deodorant did absolutely nothing for me. I might as well go without deodorant at all. I knew I was gambling, but this deodorant turned out to be as ineffective as it was expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find. Good price when you gotta' have Clinique
customer_reviews.author: William C. Clippinger

customer_reviews.title: is works.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I purchased it at least 4 times in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've used this deodorant for over 30 years. VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE ALWAYS PURCHASED THIS PRODUCT, CLINIQUE DEODORENT, IN THE "BETTER" DEPARTMENT STORES. CURRENT CIRCUMSTANCES HAS PREVENTED ME FRON GOING OUT. WHAT I RECEIVED FROM AMAZON WAS RANCID!!!!!! THE ROLL ON WAS STUCK AND HAD TO BE DRENCHED IN WATER BEFORE IT "ROLLED" TO GET PRODUCT. THE PRODUCT IS EXCELLENT, AND HAS BEEN "FOREVER"! WHAT WAS SENT TO ME MUST HAVE BEEN SITTING IN A WAREHOUSE FOR MANY YEARS! I COULD NOT USE IT AND WASTED $16.00.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best of all!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over 40 years. Best deodorant - antiperspirant, hypoallergenic I ever used. Before I found this one, I tried dozens of other brand, in a variety of forms, spray, stick, liquid rock. Nothing works as this one from Clinique.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S.

product_meta.title: CLINIQUE by Clinique Anti-Perspirant Deodorant Roll-On--/2.5OZ - Body Care
product_meta.description: CLINIQUE by Clinique ANTI-PERSPIRANT DEODORANT ROLL-ON--/2.5OZ
